title: Love is in the Air
description: Multi-Genre Romance Box Set from 5 Award-Winning Authors!Your next book boyfriends are waiting...A sexy veterinarian, a hot rock star, a broody cop, a determined warrior, and a rugged cowboy!Jezebel's Wish by AJ NuestMidnight Heat by Sarah GrimmThe Drake House by Kelly MoranGift of the Realm by Mackenzie CrowneStorm's Interlude by Vonnie Davis
author: Kelly Moran
